item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 16, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Douglas Hofstadter on Lisp (1983) (107 points | 21 comments)
2. Be Suspicious of Success (21 points | 7 comments)
3. FTC Announces "Click-to-Cancel" Rule Making It Easier to Cancel Subscriptions (448 points | 218 comments)
4. Un Ministral, Des Ministraux (44 points | 21 comments)

6. The early days of peer review: five insights from historic reports (9 points | 6 comments)
7. Floss/fund: $1M per year for free and open source projects (283 points | 72 comments)
8. Efficient High-Resolution Image Synthesis with Linear Diffusion Transformer (10 points | discuss)
9. Sqlite3 WebAssembly (594 points | 171 comments)
10. CapibaraZero: A cheap alternative to FlipperZero based on ESP32-S3 (321 points | 70 comments)
11. Redbox left PII on decommissioned machines (217 points | 103 comments)
12. Show HN: I built the most over-engineered Deal With It emoji generator (747 points | 144 comments)
13. MacOS sometimes leaks traffic after system updates (312 points | 153 comments)
14. Show HN: I 3D scanned the tunnels inside the Maya Pyramid Temples at Copan (403 points | 78 comments)
15. Eye Contact Correction: Redirecting the eyes to look at the camera (122 points | 140 comments)
16. Why don't we use awnings anymore (2022) (293 points | 244 comments)
17. The C23 edition of Modern C (473 points | 293 comments)
18. Asterinas: OS kernel written in Rust and providing Linux-compatible ABI (309 points | 170 comments)
19. Damas-Hindley-Milner inference two ways (98 points | 5 comments)
20. Show HN: Pumpkin – A Modern Minecraft server written in Rust (377 points | 140 comments)
21. Apple introduces iPad mini built for Apple Intelligence (296 points | 446 comments)
22. Mothbox 4.0 (249 points | 37 comments)
23. The Internet Archive is back online (252 points | 65 comments)
24. How ham radio endures (109 points | 44 comments)
25. Traveling with Apple Vision Pro (130 points | 170 comments)
26. Amazon refreshes its monochrome Kindle lineup, including a bigger Paperwhite (56 points | 58 comments)
27. Cofounder Mode: My tactical guide to finding a cofounder (124 points | 61 comments)
28. Life expectancy rise in rich countries slows down: took 30 years to prove (180 points | 378 comments)
29. Show HN: FTWA – Turn any website into an app (123 points | 42 comments)
